npcSpeech.text: Listen, I don't know what you're up to here but the sooner you leave the happier I'll be. See that circle on the right? It will transport you onward.
There are no sides... not anymore.
If I tell you will you leave?
He is in charge of the facility here. he pioneered the Imphuman transformation technique. Now please leave.
If you don't you will regret it scum.

response.text: I really don't know what is happening.
